metadata.title: Section 66D IT Act – Cheating by Personation
metadata.text: Whoever cheats by personation using computer resources shall be punished with imprisonment up to three years and a fine up to one lakh rupees.

metadata.title: Section 420 IPC – Cheating and Dishonestly Inducing Delivery of Property
metadata.text: Cheating and dishonestly inducing a person to deliver property is punishable with imprisonment up to seven years and fine.

metadata.title: Section 468 IPC – Forgery for Purpose of Cheating
metadata.text: Whoever commits forgery, intending that the document forged shall be used for the purpose of cheating, shall be punished with imprisonment up to seven years and fine.
